name: kemyni Johnson
title: Trimmer
coverLetter: Hello my name is Kemyni Johnson, I am inquiring you about your open bud trimmer position. I feel like l would be able to bring a lot to the table because I have fun trimming buds and i really love being around a lot of weed as well as two years of security experience, a year of university education where i spent my summer trimming buds part time. I have met and learned from patients in various places in California but wish to know more about collectives. I also have an overall basic knowledge about medical marijuana due to my living in the bay area, LA and humboldt county. Please if feel to text or call anytime me at 310 363 5632.
experience: • Professional Security Consultants 02/16 -11/17 1 year working as armed guard
